${ModID}:Quick.NAME: Quick
${ModID}:Quick.DESCRIPTION: NL Deal !D! damage. NL NL fakermod:First_Command: NL Next turn, your first attack deals !${ModID}:m2! more damage.

${ModID}:Arrival.NAME: Arrival
${ModID}:Arrival.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, gain NL !M! of Strength and Dexterity then fakermod:purge.

${ModID}:BraveShine.NAME: Brave Shine
${ModID}:BraveShine.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, NL gain [E] [E] NL fakermod:Echo *Incantation then fakermod:purge.
${ModID}:BraveShine.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, NL gain [E] [E] NL fakermod:Echo *Trace *On then fakermod:purge.

${ModID}:Disillusion.NAME: disillusion
${ModID}:Disillusion.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E]

${ModID}:ExtraAttack.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL fakermod:Purge.

${ModID}:GradationAir.NAME: Gradation Air
${ModID}:GradationAir.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL fakermod:Project a card. NL fakermod:Purge.

${ModID}:IdealWhite.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain [E] NL and draw 1.
${ModID}:IdealWhite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain [E] NL and draw 1. NL fakermod:Alter into *Mind *Of *Steel.

${ModID}:InstallArcher.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! fakermod:Endurance. NL NL Lose 3 Max HP. NL At the start of your turn, add *Gradation *Air to your hand. NL Retain.

This would kill me.

${ModID}:LastStardust.NAME: Last Stardust
${ModID}:LastStardust.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, gain NL !M! Strength and heal !${ModID}:m2! then fakermod:purge.

${ModID}:MindOfSteel.NAME: Mind of Steel
${ModID}:MindOfSteel.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, fakermod:echo *Ideal *White. Replace all *Trace with *Trace *Alter then fakermod:purge.

${ModID}:Resolution.NAME: Resolution
${ModID}:Resolution.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! of Dexterity, Thorns and Artifact.
${ModID}:Resolution.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! of Dexterity, Thorns and Artifact. NL fakermod:Alter into *Arrival.

${ModID}:TsumukariMuramasa.NAME: Tsumukari Muramasa
${ModID}:TsumukariMuramasa.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! fakermod:true_damage to ALL enemies. NL Deal !M! more for every exhausted card this combat. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:UBW_A.NAME: Unlimited Blade Works
${ModID}:UBW_A.DESCRIPTION: fakermod:Project NL *Unlimited *Blade *Burst. NL NL fakermod:Reality_Marble: Whenever you play non-projected Attack, fakermod:project a random 0-cost card. NL
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: My whole life was Unlimited Blade Works!

${ModID}:UBW_B.NAME: Unlimited Blade Works
${ModID}:UBW_B.DESCRIPTION: fakermod:Project NL *Oath *Under *Snow. NL NL fakermod:Reality_Marble: Whenever you play a fakermod:projected card, NL draw 1 and gain [E] NL
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: My whole body was still Unlimited Blade Works...!

${ModID}:UBW_C.NAME: Unlimited Blade Works
${ModID}:UBW_C.DESCRIPTION: fakermod:Project NL *Unlimited *Blade *Dance. NL NL fakermod:Reality_Marble: Whenever you play a non-projected card, fakermod:project *Blade *Dance. NL
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: So as I pray, Unlimited Blade Works.

${ModID}:ULW.NAME: Unlimited Lost Works
${ModID}:ULW.DESCRIPTION: Retain & fakermod:Projected. NL Only usable against *Origin *Bullet's target. Deal !D! fakermod:true_damage. Repeat for every card in your draw pile.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: So as I pray, Unlimited Lost Works...!

${ModID}:Arrow.NAME: Arrow
${ModID}:Arrow.DESCRIPTION: fakermod:Projected & Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Fatal, gain [E] and fakermod:project 1 *Arrow.

${ModID}:BladeDance.NAME: Blade Dance
${ModID}:BladeDance.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal & fakermod:Projected. NL Deal !D! damage randomly 1-3 times. NL Draw 1

${ModID}:Bow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: fakermod:Projected. NL Gain !B! Block. NL fakermod:Project [#78F200]Arrow+.

${ModID}:Hrunting.NAME: Hrunting

${ModID}:OriginBullet.NAME: Origin Bullet
${ModID}:OriginBullet.DESCRIPTION: fakermod:Projected. NL fakermod:Echo *Incantation. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If you dealt unblocked damage, fakermod:project *Unlimited *Lost *Works.

${ModID}:RuleBreaker.DESCRIPTION: fakermod:Projected. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Remove all Block and buffs from the non-boss target.

${ModID}:UnlimitedBladeBurst.DESCRIPTION: Retain & fakermod:Projected. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !M! more damage for every fakermod:projected card played this combat. NL End fakermod:Reality_Marble.

${ModID}:UnlimitedBladeDance.NAME: Unlimited Blade Dance
${ModID}:UnlimitedBladeDance.DESCRIPTION: Retain & fakermod:Projected. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies randomly 5-10 times. NL End fakermod:Reality_Marble.

${ModID}:Charisma.DESCRIPTION: Attacks deal !M! more damage for 3 turns. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:StrikeAir.NAME: Strike Air
${ModID}:StrikeAir.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage then apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:SummonSaber.DESCRIPTION: Gain 3 Orb slots. Shuffle 10 fakermod:Saber cards into your draw pile. NL At the start of your turn, fully channel fakermod:AP. NL NL .

${ModID}:Archery.NAME: Archery
${ModID}:Archery.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you defeat an enemy with a Ranged attack, heal !M!.

${ModID}:Avalon.NAME: Avalon
${ModID}:Avalon.DESCRIPTION: Negate ALL damage this turn. If you have fakermod:Saber, heal !${ModID}:m2!. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:AzothSword.NAME: Azoth Sword
${ModID}:AzothSword.DESCRIPTION: Retain. Exhaust. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !M! more for each unspent energy this combat.
${ModID}:AzothSword.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Retain. Exhaust. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !M! more for each unspent energy this combat.

${ModID}:BladeBurst.NAME: Blade Burst
${ModID}:BladeBurst.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !M! more damage for every fakermod:projected card played this combat.

${ModID}:BlessedKatana.NAME: Blessed Katana

${ModID}:Caliburn.NAME: Caliburn
${ModID}:Caliburn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you don't have fakermod:Saber, gain !M! Frail then exhaust.

${ModID}:CursedKatana.NAME: Cursed Katana
${ModID}:CursedKatana.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Deal !D! fakermod:true_damage. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:DestructiveKatana.NAME: Destructive Katana
${ModID}:DestructiveKatana.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a random card in your draw pile. NL Deal !D! fakermod:true_damage.

${ModID}:FollowUpStrike.NAME: Follow-Up Strike
${ModID}:FollowUpStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Thorns and draw 1.

${ModID}:Forge.NAME: Forge
${ModID}:Forge.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in your hand. NL Create a random Katana card.

${ModID}:Incantation.NAME: Incantation
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I am the bone of my sword.
Steel is my body and fire is my blood.
I have created over a thousand blades.
Unaware of loss. NL Nor aware of gain.
Withstood pain to create weapons, waiting for one's arrival.
I have no regrets. This is the only path.

Unaware of beginning.
Nor aware of the end.
Withstood pain with inconsistent weapons, my hands will never hold anything.
Yet, my flame never ends.

Unknown to Death.
Nor known to Life.
Have withstood pain to create many weapons
Yet, those hands will never hold anything
Once seeking for the ultimate blade.
A blade of steel cutting no flesh, nor bones and neither life.
What I seek for is the clearance of resentment.

The cutting of bonds, fate and destiny.
That is, to free oneself from Karma.

Upon one's arrival are countless tools.
Carved over a thousand blades, forming a pile of swords.
My whole life was for this single swing.

${ModID}:IndependentAction.NAME: Independent Action
${ModID}:IndependentAction.DESCRIPTION: Enter fakermod:Melee. NL Half your HP. Heal 50% of the damage dealt with fakermod:Melee attacks for this turn. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:IndependentAction.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enter fakermod:Melee. NL Half your HP. Heal 50% of the damage dealt with fakermod:Melee attacks for !M! turns. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:LastStand.NAME: Last Stand
${ModID}:LastStand.DESCRIPTION: Lose 3 HP. NL Add *Strike to your hand. NL *Strikes deal double damage for 3 turns.
${ModID}:LastStand.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose 3 HP. NL Add *Strike to your hand. NL *Strikes deal triple damage for 3 turns.

${ModID}:LinkShot.NAME: Link Shot
${ModID}:LinkShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy *does *not *intend to attack, apply !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:ManaLink.DESCRIPTION: Gain X [E] for !M! turn. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:ManaLink.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain X [E] for !M! turns. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:MapoTofu.NAME: Mapo Tofu
${ModID}:MapoTofu.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Heal !M!. Shuffle 1 *Burn into your draw pile.

${ModID}:MetalShield.NAME: Metal Shield
${ModID}:MetalShield.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have no Block. NL Gain !B! Block. NL You cannot gain Block this turn.

${ModID}:MetalSword.NAME: Metal Sword
${ModID}:MetalSword.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! Attack card.

${ModID}:MightyChain.NAME: Mighty Chain
${ModID}:MightyChain.DESCRIPTION: Add 0-cost *Quick, *Arts and *Buster to your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:MightyChain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add 0-cost [#78F200]Quick+, [#78F200]Arts+ and [#78F200]Buster+ to your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:MindsEye.NAME: Mind's Eye
${ModID}:MindsEye.DESCRIPTION: Enter fakermod:Range. NL Add a card from your draw pile to your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:MindsEye.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enter fakermod:Range. NL Add a card from your draw pile to your hand.

${ModID}:MyoujingiriMuramasa.NAME: Myoujingiri Muramasa
${ModID}:MyoujingiriMuramasa.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! fakermod:true_damage. NL Deal !M! more for every exhausted card this combat.
${ModID}:MyoujingiriMuramasa.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: On *Exhaust, return this to your hand. NL Deal !D! fakermod:true_damage. Deal !M! more for every exhausted card this combat.

${ModID}:NineLivesBladeWorks.NAME: Nine Lives Blade Works
${ModID}:NineLivesBladeWorks.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. NL fakermod:Project a 0-cost NL *Nine *Lives. NL *Magic *Circuits reduces cost by 1 per stack.
${ModID}:NineLivesBladeWorks.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. NL fakermod:Project a 0-cost NL [#78F200]Nine [#78F200]Lives+. NL *Magic *Circuits reduces cost by 1 per stack.

${ModID}:OriginlessCreationOfSwords.NAME:
Originless Creation
        of Swords
${ModID}:OriginlessCreationOfSwords.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your discard pile. Create *Tsumukari *Muramasa in your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:PaperShield.NAME: Paper Shield
${ModID}:PaperShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Vulnerable. Exhaust.

${ModID}:PaperSword.NAME: Paper Sword
${ModID}:PaperSword.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When you deal damage, change your enemy's intent. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:PurifyingKatana.NAME: Purifying Katana
${ModID}:PurifyingKatana.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a random card in your discard pile. NL Deal !D! fakermod:true_damage. NL Remove all your debuffs.

${ModID}:RapidStrike.NAME: Rapid Strike
${ModID}:RapidStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Costs 0 if you used a *Strike his combat.

${ModID}:Reload.NAME: Reload
${ModID}:Reload.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand then draw that many. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Reload.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Exhaust your hand then draw that many. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Strengthen.NAME: Strengthen
${ModID}:Strengthen.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade a card in your hand for the rest of combat.
${ModID}:Strengthen.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Upgrade all cards in your hand for the rest of combat.

${ModID}:SwordBarrel.NAME: Sword Barrel
${ModID}:SwordBarrel.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! fakermod:Endurance: NL When you play a Skill, fakermod:project *Blade *Dance.
${ModID}:SwordBarrel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! fakermod:Endurance: NL When you play a Skill, fakermod:project [#78F200]Blade [#78F200]Dance+.

${ModID}:TraceFractal.NAME: Trace, Fractal
${ModID}:TraceFractal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: fakermod:Project an uncommon card. NL Set its cost to 0 for this turn.

${ModID}:TraceOn.NAME: Trace On
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain fakermod:Magic_Circuits (2/5). NL *Trace fakermod:projects [#78F200]common+ and uncommon cards. NL Can be upgraded.
Gain fakermod:Magic_Circuits (3/5). NL *Trace fakermod:projects [#78F200]common+ and uncommon cards. NL Can be upgraded.
Gain fakermod:Magic_Circuits (4/5). NL *Trace fakermod:projects [#78F200]common+, [#78F200]uncommon+ and rare cards. NL Can be upgraded.
Gain fakermod:Magic_Circuits (5/5). NL *Trace fakermod:projects [#78F200]common+, [#78F200]uncommon+ and [#78F200]rare+ cards.

${ModID}:TriggerOff.NAME: Trigger Off
${ModID}:TriggerOff.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a fakermod:projected card, gain fakermod:Magic_Circuits (1/5).

${ModID}:TrapShot.NAME: Trap Shot
${ModID}:TrapShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy *intends to attack, apply !M! Weak.

${ModID}:WithstandPain.NAME: Withstand Pain
${ModID}:WithstandPain.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! fakermod:Endurance. NL Whenever you lose HP, fakermod:project *Sword.
${ModID}:WithstandPain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! fakermod:Endurance. NL Whenever you lose HP, fakermod:project [#78F200]Sword+
